short_summary: WHARF REPAIRS AT DYERS BAY ON
description: LOS description is fairly lengthy, but it can be broken down as follows into clear sections:\\
full_summary:
# Wharf Repairs – Dyers Bay, ON

## **Call for Tenders**

**Reference Number**: CB-6232-72578599
**Amendment Number**: 2
**Publication Date**: June 7, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: June 21, 2023, 13:00:00
**Contracting Authority**: Fisheries and Oceans Canada

**Project Location**: Dyers Bay, Ontario
**Project Description**: 
The project involves the repair of the existing Government Wharf at the Dyers Bay site. The work includes, but is not limited to, the removal and disposal of the existing concrete, supply and installation of new steel sheet piling and reinforcing, supply and installation of new toe pins, supply and installation of new clear stone and granular materials, and supply and installation of new concrete.

**Closings**
- *In-water work must be completed by September 15th, 2023.
- *All work must be completed by September 30th, 2023.

**Optional Work**
- Replacement of the existing concrete launch ramp.

**Note**
Only tenderers who meet the mandatory requirements listed in the Request for Qualifications (RFQ) will receive an invitation to bid.

## **Bid Process**

- *First Phase (Qualification): Evaluation of mandatory requirements
- *Second Phase (Financial Bid): Invitation to submit a financial bid on the project specifications and drawings
- *Valid bid result: List of pre-qualified bidders will be valid for 60 days

**Notice URL**: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca\sites\default\files\webform\tender\_notice\6232\30004508---request-for-qualifications\_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca\sites\default\files\webform\tender\_notice\6232\30004508---request-for-qualifications\_0.pdf)

**Additional Information**:
This tender is subject to the rules and regulations outlined in the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Canadian government procurement policies.

**Technical Specifications**: Can be found in the attached Request for Qualifications.

**Contact**
For more information, please contact Karen Dolan at Telephone (782) 377-7245, or Email: [DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca). ## End of
